title: Counting Stars
lyric:
[ti:Counting Stars]
[ar:OneRepublic]
[al:Native]
[offset:0]
[00:01.02]Lately, I've been,
[00:02.96]I've been losing sleep
[00:04.61]
[00:05.58]Dreaming about the things
[00:07.38]that we could be
[00:09.74]But baby, I've been,
[00:11.72]I've been praying hard,
[00:13.59]
[00:14.42]Said, no more counting dollars
[00:16.64]We'll be counting stars,
[00:18.89]
[00:19.53]yeah we'll be counting stars
[00:23.09]

title: Paint It Black
lyric:
[ti:Paint It Black]
[ar:Vanessa Carlton]
[al:Be Not Nobody]
[by:Van]
[offset:500]
[00:00.00]Vanessa Carlton - Paint It Black
[00:13.79]
[00:15.79]I see a red door and I want it painted black
[00:22.25]No colors anymore, I want them to turn black
[00:29.16]I see the girls walk by dressed in their summer clothes
[00:35.72]I have to turn my head until my darkness goes
[00:41.57]
[00:42.45]I see a line of cars and they are painted black
[00:49.14]With flowers and my love both never to come back
[00:56.03]I see people turn their heads, they quickly look away
[01:02.65]Like a new born baby it just happens every day 
[01:08.07]
[01:09.33]I look inside myself and see my heart is black
[01:16.36]I see my red door and it's heading into black
[01:22.86]Maybe then I'll fade away and not have to face the facts
[01:29.46]It's not easy facing up when your whole world is black
[01:34.93]I wanna see it painted, painted, painted black, oh baby
[01:41.78]I wanna see it painted, painted, painted black, oh baby
[01:49.79]
[01:56.50]No more will my green sea go turn a deeper blue
[02:02.73]I could not foresee this thing happening to you
[02:10.08]If I look hard enough into the setting sun
[02:16.65]My love will laugh with me before the morning comes
[02:22.20]
[02:49.07]I wanna see it painted, painted, painted black
[02:54.44]Oh, black as night black as coal
[02:58.38]I wanna see the sun blotted out from the sky
[03:03.39]Painted, painted, painted black, oh baby
[03:10.34]Painted, painted, painted black
[03:17.57]
[03:25.33]
[03:28.95]END

title: Make You Feel My Love
lyric:
[ti:Make You Feel My Love]
[ar:Adele]
[al:19]
[by:Yang Yong]
[02:21.07][02:12.14][02:04.41][00:13.34][00:00.00]Adele - Make You Feel My Love
[03:25.00][02:26.10][02:14.48][02:08.40][00:18.34][00:07.15]Lyrics by Yang Yong
[00:26.34]When the rain is blowing in your face
[00:32.50]And the whole world is on your case
[00:38.74]I could offer you a warm embrace
[00:44.55]To make you feel my love
[00:50.90]When the evening shatters and the stars appear
[00:57.09]And there is no one there to dry your tears
[01:03.49]I could hold you for a million years
[01:09.55]To make you feel my love
[01:15.88]I know you haven't made your mind up yet
[01:21.54]But I would never do you wrong
[01:28.23]I've known it from the moment that we met
[01:34.07]No doubt in my mind where you belong
[01:40.98]I'd go hungry I'd go black and blue
[01:47.10]I'd go crawling down the avenue
[01:53.14]Know there's nothing that I wouldn't do
[01:59.24]To make you feel my love
[02:30.61]The storms are raging on the rolling sea
[02:36.72]And on the highway of regret
[02:42.93]The winds of change are blowing wild and free
[02:48.79]You ain't seen nothing like me yet
[02:54.98]I could make you happy make your dreams come true
[03:01.88]Nothing that I wouldn't do
[03:07.80]Go to the ends of the earth for you
[03:13.94]To make you feel my love
[03:20.20]To make you feel my love

title: Viva La Vida
lyric:
[ti:Viva La Vida]
[ar:Coldplay]
[al:Viva La Vida Or Death and All His Friends]
[by: ]
[offset:500]
[00:00.00]Coldplay - Viva La Vida
[00:09.27]www.lrcgc.com   制作
[00:11.27]
[Verse 1]
[00:13.27]I used to rule the world
[00:16.95]Seas would rise when I gave the word
[00:19.67]Now in the morning I sleep alone
[00:23.84]Sweep the streets I used to own
[00:27.85]
[00:40.93]I used to roll the dice
[00:44.68]Feel the fear in my enemy's eyes
[00:47.90]Listened as the crowd would sing:
[00:51.87]"Now the old king is dead!
[00:53.61]Long live the king!"
[00:54.81]One minute I held the key
[00:58.71]Next the walls were closed on me
[01:01.43]And I discovered that my castles stand
[01:05.62]Upon pillars of salt, pillars of sand
[Chorus]
[01:09.64]I hear Jerusalem bells a-ringing
[01:13.22]Roman cavalry choirs are singing
[01:16.61]Be my mirror my sword and shield
[01:20.07]Missionaries in a foreign field
[01:23.54]For some reason I can't explain
[01:27.08]Once you'd gone there was never,
[01:29.71]never an honest word
[01:33.61]That was when I ruled the world
[01:37.83]
[Verse 2]
[01:50.10]It was the wicked and wild wind
[01:54.32]Blew down the doors to let me in
[01:57.22]Shattered windows and the sound of drums
[02:01.55]People couldn't believe what I'd become
[02:04.61]Revolutionaries wait
[02:08.36]For my head on a silver plate
[02:11.06]Just a puppet on a lonely string
[02:15.40]Oh who would ever wanna be king?
[Chorus 2]
[02:19.15]I hear Jerusalem bells a-ringing
[02:22.75]Roman Cavalry choirs are singing
[02:26.23]Be my mirror my sword and shield
[02:29.57]Missionaries in a foreign field
[02:33.14]For some reason I can't explain
[02:36.51]I know Saint Peter won't call my name
[02:39.82]Never an honest word
[02:43.10]But that was when I ruled the world
[02:47.22]
[02:59.79](Ohhhhh Ohhh Ohhh)
[Chorus 3]
[03:15.07]Hear Jerusalem bells a-ringing
[03:18.41]Roman Cavalry choirs are singing
[03:21.95]Be my mirror my sword and shield
[03:25.30]My missionaries in a foreign field
[03:28.74]For some reason I can't explain
[03:32.18]I know Saint Peter won't call my name
[03:35.42]Never an honest word
[03:38.72]But that was when I ruled the world
[03:42.72]
[03:56.63]
[04:02.51]End
